name: My Talking Goth - Free Goth Movie Maker
name_original: My Talking Goth - Free Goth Movie Maker
description:
The ultimate Goth Movie Maker!

The free version has some appearance and animation options locked. Upgrade to the paid version to unlock all options, or watch video rewards to unlock individual options for free.

* Create a cast of talking Goth avatars for your movies and pictures
* Record Goth videos in a simple and fun way
* Make Goth music videos by loading songs from your iTunes music collection
* Share your Goth creations to Messages, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr.
